Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

2 manupuththirane, Isravelin Meypparukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Urai; Nee Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu Avargalode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Meypparukku Sollugiraar; Thangalaiye Meykkira Isravelin Meypparukku Aiyo! Meyppar Allavaa Mandhaiyai Meykkavendum.
3 neengal Neyyai Saappittu, Aattumayirai Uduppaakkikkolkireergal; Kozhuththadhai Adikkireergal; Mandhaiyaiyo Meykkaamarpogireergal.

4 neengal Balaveenamaanavaigalai Balappaduththaamalum, Nasalkondavaigalai Gunamaakkaamalum, Elumbu Murindhavaigalaik Kaayankattaamalum, Thuraththundavaigalaith Thiruppikkondu Varaamalum, Kaanaamarponavaigalaith Thedaamalum Poi, Balaadhkaaramum Kadooramumaai Avaigalai Aandeergal.
5 meyppan Illaadhadhinaal Avaigal Sidharundupoyina; Sidharunduponavaigal Kaattumirugangalukkellaam Iraiyaayina.
6 en Aadugal Sagala Malaigalilum Uyaramaana Sagala Medugalilum Alaippundu, Boomiyinmeedhengum En Aadugal Sidhariththirigiradhu; Visaarikkiravanumillai, Thedugiravanumillai.
7 aagaiyaal Meyppare, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

8 karththaraagiya Aandavaraayirukkira Naan En Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren; Meyppan Illaadhadhinaal En Aadugal Sooraiyaagi, En Aadugal Kaattumirugangalukkellaam Iraiyaaip Poyina; En Meyppargal En Aadugalai Visaariyaamarponaargal, Meyppargal Mandhaiyai Meykkaamal Thangalaiye Meyththaargal.
9 aagaiyaal Meyppare, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

10 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Idho, Naan Meypparukku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, En Aadugalai Avargal Kaiyile Kettu, Meyppar Inith Thangalaiye Meykkaadhapadi Mandhaiyai Meykkum Thozhilaivittu Avargalai Vilakki, En Aadugal Avargalukku Aagaaramaayiraadhapadi, Avaigalai Avargal Vaaikkuth Thappappannuven Endru Sollu.
11 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Naan Naane En Aadugalai Visaariththu, Avaigalaith Thedippaarppen.

12 oru Meyppan Sidharunda Than Aadugalin Naduve Irukkira Naalil Than Mandhaiyaith Thedikkondirukkiradhupola, Naan En Aadugalaith Thedi, Mappum Mandhaaramumaana Naalile Avaigal Sidharundupona Ellaa Idangalilumirundhu Avaigalaith Thappi Varappanni,

13 avaigalai Janangalidaththilirundhu Purappadavum Dhesangalilirundhu Seravumpanni, Avaigaludaiya Suyadhesaththile Avaigalaik Konduvandhu, Isravel Malaigalinmelum Aarugal Andaiyilum Dhesaththin Sagala Vaasasthalangalilum Avaigalai Meyppen.

14 avaigalai Nalla Meychchalile Meyppen; Israveludaiya Uyarndha Malaigalil Avargaludaiya Thozhuvam Irukkum; Ange Avaigal Nalla Thozhuvaththil Paduththukkollum; Isravelin Malaigalinmel Nalla Meychchalai Meyum.
15 en Aadugalai Naan Meyththu Avaigalai Naan Madakkuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

16 naan Kaanaamarponadhaiththedi Thuraththundadhaith Thirumbakkonduvandhu, Elumbu Murindhadhaik Kaayankatti, Nasalkondadhaith Thidappaduththuven; Nyaayaththukkuth Thakkadhaai Avaigalai Meyththu, Pushtiyum Belamumullavaigalai Azhippen.
17 en Mandhaiye Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Aattukkum Aattukkum, Aattukkadaakkalukkum, Vellaattukkadaakkalukkum Naan Nyaayantheerppen.

18 neengal Nalla Meychchalai Meyndhu, Ungal Meychchalgalil Meedhiyaanadhai Ungal Kaalgalaal Midhikkalaamaa? Thelindha Thanneeraik Kudiththu Meedhiyaayirukkiradhai Ungal Kaalgalaal Kuzhappippodalaamaa?
19 en Aadugal Ungal Kaalgalaal Midhikkappattadhai Meyavum, Ungal Kaalgalaal Kuzhappappattadhaik Kudikkavum Vendumo?
20 aagaiyaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Avaigalai Nokki: Idho, Naan, Naane Kozhuththa Aadugalukkum Ilaiththa Aadugalukkum Nyaayantheerppen.
21 neengal Balaveenamaayirukkiravaigalaiyellaam Purambaakki Sidharappannumpadi, Avaigalaip Pakkaththinaalum Munnanthodaiyinaalum Thalli Ungal Kombugalaikkondu Muttugirapadiyinaale,
22 naan En Aadugalai Ini Sooraiyaagaadhapadikku Ratchiththu, Aadugalukkum Aadugalukkum Nyaayantheerppen.
23 avargalai Meykkumpadi En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Ennum Ore Meyppanai Naan Avargalmel Visaarippaayirukka Erpaduththuven; Ivar Avargalai Meyththu, Ivare Avargalukku Meyppanaayiruppaar.
24 karththaraagiya Naan Avargalukku Dhevanaaga Iruppen, En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Avargal Naduvil Adhipadhiyaayiruppaar; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen.

25 naan Avargalodu Samaadhaana Udanpadikkaiseydhu, Dhushta Mirugangalai Dhesaththil Iraadhapadikku Ozhiyappannuven; Avargal Sugamaai Vanaandharaththil Thaabariththu, Kaadugalil Niththiraipannuvaargal.
26 naan Avargalaiyum En Mettin Sutruppurangalaiyum Aaseervaadhamaakki, Etrakaalaththile Mazhaiyaippeyyappannuven; Aaseervaadhamaana Mazhai Peyyum.

27 veliyin Virutchangal Thangal Kaniyaiththarum; Boomi Than Palanaikkodukkum; Avargal Thangal Dhesaththil Sugamaayiruppaargal; Naan Avargal Nugaththin Kayirugalai Aruththu, Avargalai Adimaikondavargalil Kaikku Avargalai Neengalaakki Viduvikkumpodhu, Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
28 ini Avargal Purajaadhigalukku Kollaiyaavadhillai, Boomiyin Mirugangal Avargalaip Patchippadhumillai; Thaththalikkappannuvaar Illaamal Sugamaaith Thanguvaargal.
29 naan Avargalukkuk Keerththiporundhiya Oru Naatrai Ezhumbappannuven; Avargal Ini Dhesaththile Panjaththaal Vaarikkollappaduvadhumillai, Inip Purajaadhigal Seyyum Avamaanaththai Sumappadhumillai.

30 thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkira Naan Thangalode Irukkiradhaiyum, Isravel Vamsaththaaraagiya Thaangal En Janamaayirukkiradhaiyum, Avargal Arindhukolvaargalendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
31 en Mandhaiyum En Meychchalin Aadugalumaagiya Neengal Manushar; Naan Ungal Dhevan Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
